select jan_new as jan,face,sku_rank,jan_rank
janinfo."${item1.zokuseiCol}"
janinfo."${item2}"
as "zokusei${item1.zokuseiId}"
coalesce(janinfo."${item.attrVal}", '0') as "${item.attr}"
from planocycle.work_priority_order_jan_new new inner join ${proInfoTable} janinfo on janinfo."1"=new.jan_new where new.priority_order_cd=#{priorityOrderCd} and not exists( select * from planocycle.work_basic_pattern_restrict_result_data where priority_order_cd=new.priority_order_cd and jan_cd and new.jan_new ) order by sku_rank,jan_rank
